name: Blasteroids (itch) (Kharibidus)
description:
Asteroids with a twist. Fling rocks at enemy spaceships, choose new powerups, survive as long as you can.

Try typing 'cheater' if you are having trouble.

Created for the GitHub Game Off 2022.

Tools used:

Unity 2021.3.4f1

Tiny Worlds - Thaleah Pixel Font

Zero Rare - Retro Sound Effects

Archanor VFX - Polygon Arsenal

Demigiant - DoTween Pro

Sirenix - Odin Inspector

Michael La Manna - Badlands Music Pack 3
